event.title: Happy Pongal Facebook And Whatsapp Status
event.description:
HAPPY PONGAL GREETINGS FOR WHATSAPP & SMS

13:42
In my last post I have given you the best of Advance Pongal Wishes SMS to send to your family and loved ones. Now that the actual Pongal Festival has arrived, you need to send Happy Pongal Greetings to all your near and dear ones. If our thoughts have already matched and you reached my post in search of Happy Pongal Greetings then you have hit the right post. Today, I am going to share with you all the new and unique Happy Pongal Greetings for the special people in special life. So, what are you waiting for? Go through my collection of Happy Pongal Greetings, select your favorite one and spread the greeting. Before reading the collection, accept my Happy Pongal Greeting for you! :D
Happy Pongal Greetings Through SMS

Like a sunny and striking Kolam
May your days be dotted
With Ecstasy and Contentment!
May the Pongal brings in
Fresh Hopefulness and Good Harvest
For you and your family.
Happy Pongal!
*
May success and glee curl in your life
All the way through the year as you rejoice
The harvest festival of Pongal
Happy Pongal Greeting to you!
*
Pongal marks happiness and good spirits
It fetches along with it, the whole kit and caboodle that’s unsurpassed
May this festival of harvest
Be the one that gets along with it
All that’s finest and everything you ask for
And you surely deserve my Happy Pongal Greetings.
Have a memorable Pongal!
*

May Pongal seal your life with melodiousness
May the Sun glow with its brightness
In a form of bliss in your life
Let it overshadow all the darkness
To bring prosperity and joy in your life
Let all it start
With my Happy Pongal Greetings!
*
Start this year with honey and smile,
Overlook all your qualms for a while,
Bidding you glee and all of cheer,
Let’s greet, Pongal is here.
Happy Pongal!
*
As the Sun begins its northward voyage
You begin you journey of progress
With a sugar filled mouth
Let’s scream and shout
Happy Pongal Greetings to each other
And to the people who matter.
Happy Pongal!
*
Laugh together
Cheer together
Let us paint the world with our laughter
In this Festive season of Pongal
Let us pray together
Let happiness spread
Don’t allow the pureness to fade
Wishing you a happy life
Along with my Happy Pongal Greetings!
*
It’s time to celebrate prosperity
It’s time to spread happiness
It’s time to thank Sun god
It’s time to celebrate
It’s time to send my greeting to you
Happy Pongal to you!
*
As Pongal emanates once again
Carrying along with it
A harvest of Contentment and Sweet Jiffies
Hope you and your near ones
Be sanctified with delight and pleasure
Happy Pongal!
*
A short and sweet greeting
Loaded with love and care
To wish you and your happy family
On this auspicious day
Happy Pongal!

So, here was my collection of Happy Pongal Greetings. These are unique greetings designed exclusively for loved one. Let the greetings run around your circle and wish your near and dear ones Happy Pongal. Don’t forget to share the post to help others choose a greeting for their love ones. Happy Pongal once again! Thank You.
